duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead media relations and reputation strategies and implement media outreach, press strategy, and internal and external communication initiatives.
Develop and execute strategic media outreach plan at conferences and events.
Identify proactive press opportunities and coach thought leaders in the organization to create content based on research, data, personas, and product/member journeys.
Manage relationships with outside PR firms, national publications, and organizational executives.
Craft media, reputational, and metrics report with actionable insights.
Draft press releases, media pitches, and press outreach strategies.
Maintain listings on third-party websites and monitor online chatter and sites to protect the brand.
Set effective benchmarks for measuring the impact of media outreach and analyze, review, and report on the effectiveness of campaigns.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Communications, Journalism or related field
